ygData.subject: BEWARE OF HAPPY99.exe
ygData.msgSnippet: Today i jsut received a message from a guy  named Franck Kurbin with the folloaing email: rkurbin@bellsouth.net His message was emailed to
ygData.messageBody:
Today i jsut received a message from a guy named Franck Kurbin with the folloaing email: rkurbin@...

His message was emailed to EQ_research_spell@onelist.com
He was spoking about Word of Possession (humm humm). The thing is thqt there was a file attached to his email....yes happy99.exe the virus who would let anyone able to take posession of your computer: So dor the ones who doesnt know; dont even open it or save;; just throw the message away and delete it asap.

I jsut hope his guy isnt an EQ player...

About the Research thing, i m trying to organise a meeting with a bunch of Dark Elfves Necros in order to learn all the language. For those who didnt understand of what i m talking about...we have four language research to know: Old Erudian, Elder Teir'Dal aka Kobolt language; Dragon and Combine language. So what i m doing is quite simple: i gather 10 necros including me:
- necro1 is going to learn 10 points of Kobolt for example and learn this 10 points to the whoel group
-necro 2 who has already 10 points go to train 10 points in the guild and learn his knowledge to the group
- on an so on
-necro 10 who has 90 in kobolt language go to learn blah blah. Then after this long process everyone is knowing the kobolt language perfectly.

Positive: You meet a lot of people that can become friends...plus they all from the same class so it can helps for further advices.
You can translate the necro book for only 10 points training skill

Negative: Hard to gather so many ppl =0
Long process

Cya all on Rathe Server

Muad Amenoire (Necro Level 23)

N.B: a necro jsut let me known that a group of 6 bnecros including her killed a Sand Giant in Oasis. 2 Levels 17, 1 Level 18 and 3 levels 20...Amazing huh? heh NEcros are really powerfull. i dont have any doubt anymore =)
